model Post {
  fields {
    title Text
    author Author
  }
}

model Author {
  fields {
    name Text
    posts Post[]
  }
}

====

export type Timestamp = string

export interface Post {
  title: string
  author: Author
  id: string
  createdAt: Date
  updatedAt: Date
  authorId?: string
}

export interface Author {
  name: string
  posts: Post[]
  id: string
  createdAt: Date
  updatedAt: Date
}

export interface Identity {
  email: string
  password: string
  id: string
  createdAt: Date
  updatedAt: Date
}
